subdefinitions.definition: Able to be exchanged , one for the other , especially ( historical numismatics ) Able to be exchanged for specie . ( numismatics ) Able to be exchanged for foreign currency . ( finance ) Able to be exchanged for a different class of security ( usually common stock ) under certain set terms .
Able to undergo conversion ( i.e. , inversion ) without falsehood .
Able to be turned , especially ( obsolete ) Able to be turned in a different direction . Able to be turned to a different purpose . Able to be turned to a different religion or belief .
Able to be turned into a different thing , especially ( vehicles ) Able to change from a closed to an open frame and back again . ( obsolete ) Able to be easily digested .
